comment.author: 72133717@N05
comment._content: According to the CWGC website he was Pte William Joseph Neighbour Service No 6071 of the 38th Btn A.I.F. who died 31 May 1917 and is buried in Strand Military Cemetery 13 Km south of Ypres in Belgium. Grave Ref. III.C.6. He was the son of James and Mary Neighbour of Wentworth, New South Wales.

comment.author: 68061336@N05
comment._content:
good to see an a private soldier here 

With the going down of the sun and in the morning we will remember them

comment.author: 62508825@N00
comment._content: Service record info Joined 38th Btn 1st May 1906 Wentworth. Born Pooncarie Wentworth NSW. Age 26. Station hand. Next of kin: (sister) Esther Annie Neighbour, Windamingle Anabranch Wentworth. mappingouranzacs.naa.gov.au/details-permalink.aspx?barcod...
